about_the_game:
Infinitory combines city-building, automation, and tower defense in a rogue-lite, top-down experience. Construct a sprawling vertical factory in limited space, automate the production of vital resources, and defend against relentless waves of enemies in procedurally generated environments.
Every playthrough offers new challenges, with varying drop zones and unpredictable terrain. As you fight to reclaim Earth’s resources, each mission will demand fresh strategies, ensuring each experience is unique as you fight to secure humanity’s survival.

VFC-79 - The Mysterious Event

A global catastrophe has left Earth overrun by terrifying creatures. While the full details remain classified, you know enough: vital resources must be reclaimed from the planet to ensure humanity’s survival aboard orbital sanctuaries. As a commander, it’s your job to venture into this hostile environment and secure what’s needed at any cost.

Construct – Build Vertically

In Infinitory, ground space is limited, forcing you to expand your factory vertically. Strategically plan your multi-layered factory, making the most of every available inch to automate production and manage resources efficiently.

Automate – Power Your Factory

Automation is key to success. Set up production lines to process resources into valuable materials. Every item from ammunition for your defensive towers to upgrades for your base must be efficiently produced to keep your factory running and protected.

Defend – Survive the Invasion

Building your factory isn’t enough, protecting it is essential. As your factory grows, it will attract relentless threats. Construct defenses and supply them with the necessary resources. Each decision you make is crucial Strategic placement, resource management, and quick adaptation will determine whether your base survives or falls.

Evolve – Adapt and Overcome

No two missions are the same. Each run lets you refine your strategy, adjusting your approach based on the environment and challenges ahead. Select your drop zone carefully, adapt to the terrain’s unique obstacles, and learn from past failures to increase your chances of success in future missions.

Features

  • Vertical City-Building: Build upwards, managing space strategically as you expand your multi-layered factory.

  • Automation: Create complex production lines to gather and refine resources, ensuring a steady flow of supplies.

  • Tower Defense: Defend your base by constructing and maintaining defensive towers, each requiring specific ammunition.

  • Rogue-Lite Gameplay: Procedurally generated maps, evolving challenges, and tech-tree bonuses that unlock as you progress make every playthrough unique.

  • Enemy Variety: Battle against a wide array of mutated creatures, each offering new challenges and requiring different strategies to defeat.

Join the Community!

Connect with other commanders. Help shape the future of Infinitory and stay up-to-date with the latest news and development updates.

  • Join us on Discord to chat with the developer and other players.

  • Wishlist Infinitory on Steam to be notified when the game launches!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, SteamOS 2.0, or similar (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 270 with 2 GB VRAM, Vulkan compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, keyboard, optional game controller
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04, SteamOS 3.0, or similar (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 with 8 GB VRAM, Vulkan compatible
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, keyboard, optional game controller
